DOC.HEADLINE: HOTEL WORKERS IN BERMUDA WALK_OUT
DOC.TEXT: Hotel workers went_on strike Friday in a dispute over tips , disrupting the vacations of thousands of tourists . Hotel employees in the Bermuda Industrial Union voted Thursday in favor of the strike . Bellboys , restaurant staff , maids and all other types of workers began forming picket_lines at 5:30 a.m. Friday . Union President Ottiwell Simmons said 3 # 000 workers from all 19 of the island ' s major hotels would be_on strike until their demands are met . The union represents all non-government unionized employees in Bermuda . Many of the hotels were reported to be fully booked , mostly with tourists from the United States . An estimated 3 # 000 to 4 # 000 tourists were affected by the walkout .
